cleaned_text: Living With Chronic Illness Season 1 Episode 2 | 26m 40s | Video has closed captioning. Modern medicine has transformed some diseases from a death sentence to a chronic illness. See how three Minnesota families adjust to living with chronic illness, including the use of alternative therapies to supplement traditional medicine, and focus on creating fulfilling lives.
